duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement core talent processes and programs for 2,000+ global employees.
Design and shape culture, values, and growth and development for all team members.
Build and lead talent review and succession planning processes.
Develop and execute leadership framework and assessment approach.
Partner with HRBPs on org-level strategies and company-wide programs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
